00086 inline void trf::ComputeSceneTreeMap( InstanceNode* instanceNode, Transform parentWTO,QVector< QPair< TShapeKit*, Transform > >* surfacesList, bool insertInSurfaceList )
00087 {
00088 
00089         if( !instanceNode ) return;
00090         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* > ( instanceNode->GetNode() );
00091         if( !coinNode ) return;
00092 
00093         if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00094         {
00095                 SoTransform* nodeTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* >(coinNode->getPart( "transform", true ) );
00096                 Transform objectToWorld = tgf::TransformFromSoTransform( nodeTransform );
00097                 Transform worldToObject = objectToWorld.GetInverse();
00098 
00099                 BBox nodeBB;
00100                 Transform nodeWTO(worldToObject * parentWTO );
00101                 instanceNode->SetIntersectionTransform( nodeWTO );
00102 
00103                 bool insertChildInSurfaceList=insertInSurfaceList;
00104                 if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TAnalyzerKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00105                 {
00106                         insertChildInSurfaceList = false;
00107                 }
00108                 for( int index = 0; index < instanceNode->children.count() ; ++index )
00109                 {
00110                         InstanceNode* childInstance = instanceNode->children[index];
00111                         ComputeSceneTreeMap(childInstance, nodeWTO, surfacesList, insertChildInSurfaceList );
00112 
00113                         nodeBB = Union( nodeBB, childInstance->GetIntersectionBBox() );
00114                 }
00115 
00116                 instanceNode->SetIntersectionBBox( nodeBB );
00117 
00118         }
00119         else if (coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShapeKit::getClassTypeId()))
00120         {
00121                 Transform shapeTransform;
00122                 Transform shapeToWorld;
00123 
00124                 SoTransform* nodeTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* >(((SoBaseKit*)coinNode)->getPart( "transform", false ) );
00125                 if (nodeTransform)
00126                 {
00127                         shapeToWorld = tgf::TransformFromSoTransform( nodeTransform );
00128                         Transform worldToObject = shapeToWorld.GetInverse();
00129                         shapeTransform = worldToObject * parentWTO ;
00130                 }
00131                 else
00132                 {
00133                         shapeTransform = parentWTO;
00134                         shapeToWorld = shapeTransform.GetInverse();
00135                 }
00136 
00137 
00138                 BBox shapeBB;
00139 
00140                 if(  instanceNode->children.count() > 0 )
00141                 {
00142                         InstanceNode* shapeInstance = 0;
00143                         if( instanceNode->children[0]->GetNode()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShape::getClassTypeId() ) )
00144                                 shapeInstance =  instanceNode->children[0];
00145                         else if(  instanceNode->children.count() > 1 )  shapeInstance =  instanceNode->children[1];
00146 
00147                         if( shapeInstance )
00148                         {
00149                                 TShape* shapeNode = static_cast< TShape* > ( shapeInstance->GetNode() );
00150                                 shapeBB = shapeToWorld( shapeNode->GetBBox() );
00151 
00152                                 instanceNode->SetIntersectionTransform( shapeTransform );
00153                                 instanceNode->SetIntersectionBBox( shapeBB );
00154 
00155                                 if (insertInSurfaceList)
00156                                 {
00157                                         TShapeKit* surface = static_cast< TShapeKit* > ( coinNode );
00158                                         surfacesList->push_back( QPair< TShapeKit*, Transform >( surface, shapeTransform ) );
00159                                 }
00160                         }
00161                 }
00162 
00163         }
00164 }

00167 inline void trf::CreatePhotonMap( TPhotonMap*& photonMap, QPair< TPhotonMap* , std::vector< RayTracerPhoton > > photonsList )
00168 {
00169         if( !photonMap )  photonMap = photonsList.first;
00170 
00171         std::vector< RayTracerPhoton >::iterator it;
00172         it = photonsList.second.begin();
00173 
00174         int rayLength;
00175         while( it < photonsList.second.end() )
00176         {
00177                 rayLength = 1;
00178                 Photon* first = new Photon( it->pos, it->shapeFront, 0, 0, 0, it->intersectedSurface );
00179                 Photon* nextPhoton = first;
00180 
00181                 while( (++it)<photonsList.second.end() && ( it->id > 0 ) )
00182                 {
00183                         Photon* photon = new Photon( it->pos, it->shapeFront, nextPhoton, 0, 0, it->intersectedSurface );
00184 
00185                         nextPhoton->next = photon;
00186                         nextPhoton = photon;
00187 
00188                         rayLength++;
00189                 }
00190                 photonMap->StoreRay( first, rayLength );
00191         }
00192         photonsList.second.clear();
00193 }
00194 
00195 inline Transform trf::GetObjectToWorld(SoPath* nodePath)
00196 {
00197         SoGetMatrixAction* getmatrixAction = new SoGetMatrixAction( SbViewportRegion () );
00198         getmatrixAction->apply( nodePath );
00199 
00200         return tgf::TransformFromMatrix( getmatrixAction->getMatrix( ) );
00201 }
